description.value:
Puts the user in a deep sleep, that, for all intents and purposes, makes them look like they are dead. Shutting down metabolism and life processes to the verge of death. Requires -10 Medicae Test to determine proper dosage, failiure causes unexpected results, 4+ DoF results in actual death. Successs puts one into a trance-like state for 1-10 days.

Requirements

Those in a trance from this drug can be roused early with a dose of Stimm to the Heart, however must immediately make a Toughness Test to avoid dying of Cardiac Arrest.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 500 T
